name: 弗洛伦西亚·伯纳
name_full: 弗洛伦西亚·伯纳 Florencia Berner

last_movies.title: 光之安塔雷斯：末日教派大揭秘

introduction: Florencia Berner, born with flamenco shoes and a microphone, has built her career playing brave and strong teenagers. She is originally from Santiago, Chile where she graduated as a psychologist at the same time she became an actress. In 2018 Florencia appeared on Prime Video's "Como andamos por casa" as Valentina Ahumada, and today she has three feature series set for release later this year, including "Secretos de Familia", "Llevame al cielo" (Disney & Fabula), and "Dime con quien andas" (Paramount +).
